column5: Ever dream of having a place to turn off the stress, a quiet retreat, a cottage in which to relax? River Rock Bed & Breakfast Cottage is that place.  We are happy to accommodate all schedules. Rent the cottage for one or more nights or from morning one day till evening the next.  Little luxuries make River Rock Bed & Breakfast Cottage a paradise where you can enjoy a stay-cation. Come relax in the peaceful surroundings and be a King or Queen for a day or even an extended stay.
column8: River Rock Bed and Breakfast Cottages
